name: AR-enhanced environment for FM supported by OpenBIM
description: Created an AR-based application to integrate BIM with AR, enhancing collaboration and productivity in construction by leveraging WebXR with IFC.

name: Web-based Application to Manage BIM Projects
description: Developed a web application to manage projects and teams using React components and a Firebase database. Integrated an IFC viewer using That Open Engine to interact with BIM models and project data in realtime.

name: Interactive CV Web React Application
description: Developed this personal CV website using React, TypeScript, and Tailwind. The app features dynamic sorting and filtering for skills, work history, and projects, along with a responsive design across devices.
